Interface IMigrationSqlGenerator

Defines a service capable of translating schema differences into database-specific SQL statements.

Namespace: nORM.Migration
Assembly: nORM.dll
Syntax
public interface IMigrationSqlGenerator

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

GenerateSql(SchemaDiff)

Generates the SQL statements required to migrate the database from the old schema to the new schema.

Declaration
MigrationSqlStatements GenerateSql(SchemaDiff diff)
Parameters
Type Name Description
SchemaDiff diff

The schema differences between the current database and the target model.
Returns
Type Description
MigrationSqlStatements

A collection of SQL statements for applying and reverting the schema changes.
